pageContext.claim: “Sorry Chief Justice John Roberts, but you do indeed have ‘Obama judges,’ and they have a much different point of view than the people who are charged with the safety of our country. It would be great if the 9th Circuit was indeed an ‘independent judiciary,’ but if it is why...... .....are so many opposing view (on Border and Safety) cases filed there, and why are a vast number of those cases overturned. Please study the numbers, they are shocking. We need protection and security - these rulings are making our country unsafe! Very dangerous and unwise!”
pageContext.analysis: California, where the 9th Circuit is based, is the largest border state by population. Courts all over the country, not just the 9th Circuit, have ruled against Trump's immigration and border policies. Under the U.S. constitutional system, judges have the final say on questions of law.
